title: Skinning and Preparing Snakes
brief: Safely skin and prepare snakes for cooking while avoiding the dangerous head.
steps: Step 1: Cut off the snake's head immediately and bury it deeply.
Step 2: Make a cut through the skin 15-20 centimeters down from where the head was.
Step 3: Peel the skin back from the cut.
Step 4: Grasp the skin in one hand and the body in the other, then pull apart.
Step 5: For large snakes, slit the belly skin if needed to complete skinning.
Step 6: Remove entrails and discard them.
Step 7: Cut snake into small sections for cooking.
warnings: Always bury the head deeply - snake heads can remain venomous even after death.
Handle snake heads with extreme caution or use tools.
Remove all entrails as they can contain parasites.
